document_data.mainbody:
yzandra Calderos, or Lyzzie, was the third-in-command of the Cult of the Eternal Flame at the Temple of the Eternal Flame in Tyar-Besil during the Elemental Evil crisis.
In 1491 DR, Lyzzie was with four magmins until some adventurers infiltrated the temple and confronted and defeated her.
